citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:20 PM on March
8, 2023. Licensee was contacted by phone. Licensee was not at facility and not able to return to do an inspection.
End Section
